rescuecore2.standard.misc
Class AgentPath

java.lang.Object
  rescuecore2.standard.misc.AgentPath

public abstract class AgentPath
extends java.lang.Object

A class for encapsulating the actual movement path an agent took during a timestep.

Method Detail

computePath

public static AgentPath computePath(Human human,
                                    StandardWorldModel world)
Compute the path an agent took. This will read the positionHistory property and generate a path.

Parameters:
human - The agent.
world - The world model.
Returns:
The computed Path, or null if the agent didn't move.

getPointOnPath

public abstract Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getPointOnPath(double d)
Get the coordinates of a point along this path.

Parameters:
d - The distance along the path in the range [0..1].
Returns:
The coordinates of the point along the path.

getLength

public abstract double getLength()
Get the length of this path.

Returns:
The length of the path.
